headline: Should You Buy the Post-Earnings Plunge in Marvell Stock?
summary: Marvell stock tumbles as the chipmaker misses expectations for Q2 data center revenue and future guidance. A JPMorgan analyst recommends buying the post-earnings dip in MRVL shares.

raw.headline: Should You Buy the Post-Earnings Plunge in Marvell Stock?

headline: Deutsche Bank Fined $3M by Hong Kong's SFC Over Multiple Breaches
summary: DB faces nearly $3.05M fine from Hong Kong's SFC over fee overcharges, risk misratings and disclosure lapses.

headline: JPMorgan sees strong investment opportunities in European beauty
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan analysts said the global beauty market remains under pressure after a weak first half, but identified select European stocks as attractive into the second half of 2025.

headline: Is JPMorgan Chase Stock Outperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Despite JPMorgan Chase's outperformance relative to the S&P 500 Index over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Is Berkshire Hathaway Stock Underperforming the Dow?
summary: Berkshire Hathaway has lagged the performance of the Dow Jones Industrial Average over the past year, but analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s future potential.

headline: Does Citi’s Hiring Spree Signal a Tipping Point for JPMorgan Chase in 2025?
summary: If you have JPMorgan Chase in your portfolio, or you have been thinking about it, you are probably wondering what comes next. Is now the right moment to add more shares, hold on tight, or cash out after the recent run? Over the past year, this stock has surged an impressive 38.5%, and its five-year return sits at a stunning 239.8%. Even just in the past week, JPMorgan Chase gained 3.3%, showing there is still plenty of momentum. Some of this movement can be traced back to the broader...

headline: Freedom Broker Lifts JPMorgan Chase (JPM) Price Target After Strong Q2 Earnings
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) ranks among the best diversified bank stocks to invest in right now. Freedom Broker kept its Hold rating on JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) and lifted its price target from $240 to $295 on August 20. The change comes after JPMorgan’s impressive second-quarter 2025 results, in which the company’s earnings […]
